NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 DAZ: My love, are you well? 2 1 DAZ: Privet tells me you are trying to run more tests using the Deep Storm Station, despite the knowledge that it cannot find the Eye of the Universe.. 3 2 DAZ: If this message reaches you through the Deep Storm Station's projection wall, you must be thinking of me as well.. I wish to hear from you, Cassava. 4 3 CASSAVA: Even if we know what happens, what can we do but keep trying? The Deep Storm Station is our only path forward, now that the Ash Twin Project has failed.. 5 4 DAZ: My love, do not let yourself be so discouraged by the failure of the Ash Twin Project. We will find another way to reach our goals.. I am sure of it! 6 4 DAZ: Poke, Pye and Clary are already exploring the newly arrived comet at this very moment. Imagine what knowledge we may 7 6 CASSAVA: Daz? Did something interrupt your thought? 8 7 CASSAVA: Daz? What happened? Daz? WorkshopTop EX1 8 Workshop R2 8 DSS R5 8
